data.persona: I am the king of the entire land. It is my duty to protect the villagers from outside attacks. I tax the villagers and use peasants for my labor.
data.description:
You are in the Kings chambers.
The large four poster bed is adorned with the finest linens that Europe has to offer.  Gold is liberally woven through the fabric of the duvet and the tassels that drape to the floor on each corner of the duvet.  A gauzy purple fabric hanging from the bed posts sets an opaque tone to the room.  One window is shuttered by large wooden planks that can be thrown open to allow the mid day light to illuminate the room.  A large chest of drawers holds a small portion of the King's clothing.
There's a Linen, a duvet, a large chest of drawers, a King's clothing, a Tassel, a window, a plank, a gauzy purple fabric, a large four poster bed, and a Gold here.
The a royal prince and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes, a jewelry, a crown, and a robe.

            "desc": "The large four poster bed is adorned with the finest linens that Europe has to offer. A gauzy purple fabric hanging from the bed posts sets an opaque tone to the room.  One window is shuttered by large wooden planks that can be thrown open to allow the mid day light to illuminate the room.  A large chest of drawers holds a small portion of the King's clothing.",
            "extra_desc": "This room was designed by a team of the finest decorators in the kingdom, but it has been nicknamed the bloodbath, because the king put to death 3 designers for \"not meeting the standard set forth\".  The fourth designer, a young upstart, is now the most famous in the land because of his work on this one room.  The king feels most powerful when he is in this room.",

data.short_motivation: I want a new window for my chambers.
data.mid_motivation: I want to a larger view of the kingdom from my bed chambers.
data.long_motivation: I eventually want a giant balcony outside my new window to address the people from.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the wall and explain to the prince what kind of window I want.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give window schematics to the prince.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the prince, who calls the craftsman in.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat a meal while I watch the craftsman and his apprentice plan my new window.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink wine with the prince while the men begin working on the window.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink more wine, since I know the queen is going to have a fit about the construction going on in the bedroom tonight!
